description.value: At 9th level, as a full-round action, you can alter the size and health of plant life, as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.tvhm9lzgnjlcucsn]{Plant Growth} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.pasrd8rsy38vmaw6]{Diminish Plants}. Alternatively, you can transform one willing non-plant creature per sorcerer level (no two of which can be more than 30 feet apart) as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ho3wsspkqkhypt0]{Tree Shape}. You may transform creatures as @Compendium[pf1.spells.y653mq8kmma3kg3w]{Plant Shape I} at 15th level, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.ik4riccm7tozdwox]{Plant Shape II} at 20th level. You can transform non-plant creatures using this power once per day.
